00042 PrimaryGeneratorAction* PrimaryGeneratorAction::fPrimaryGeneratorAction = 0;
00043 
00044 PrimaryGeneratorAction::PrimaryGeneratorAction()
00045         : MyConfigure(),
00046         root_index(0),
00047         m_TChain(0),
00048         particleGun(0),  //pointer a to G4  class
00049         gunMessenger(0),   //messenger of this class
00050         fParticle(0),
00051         fp(0)
00052 {
00053         if (fPrimaryGeneratorAction){
00054                 G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::PrimaryGeneratorAction()","Run0031",
00055                                 FatalException, "PrimaryGeneratorAction constructed twice.");
00056         }
00057         fPrimaryGeneratorAction = this;
00058         //create a messenger for this class
00059         gunMessenger = new PrimaryGeneratorMessenger(this);
00060 
00061         // default particle kinematic
00062         G4String file_name = getenv("GENFILEROOT");
00063         ReadCard(file_name);
00064         Initialize();
00065 
00066         // Initialise all the TURTLE/data fits
00067         fXPositionFinalFocusFit = NULL;
00068         fYPositionFinalFocusFit = NULL;
00069 
00070         fXPositionFinalFocus_Lower = -1.5;
00071         fXPositionFinalFocus_Upper = 1.5;
00072 
00073         fYPositionFinalFocus_Lower = -1.5;
00074         fYPositionFinalFocus_Upper = 1.5;
00075 
00076         fMuPCBeamDistHist = NULL;
00077 
00078         //      fMuPCBeamDistRandom = new TH2F("muPC_random", "muPC_random", 100,-24,24, 100,-24,24);
00079         //      fFFBeamDistRandom = new TH2F("FF_random", "FF_random", 100,-24,24, 100,-24,24);;
00080 }

00096 PrimaryGeneratorAction* PrimaryGeneratorAction::GetPrimaryGeneratorAction(){
00097         if ( !fPrimaryGeneratorAction ){
00098                 new PrimaryGeneratorAction();
00099         }
00100         return fPrimaryGeneratorAction;
00101 }
00102 
00103 void* PrimaryGeneratorAction::get_extra(G4String name){
00104         if (name=="weight") {if(!flag_weight)  return &root_double[9];}
00105         else if (name=="ox") {if(!flag_ox)  return &root_double[10];}
00106         else if (name=="oy") {if(!flag_oy)  return &root_double[11];}
00107         else if (name=="oz") {if(!flag_oz)  return &root_double[12];}
00108         else if (name=="opx") {if(!flag_opx)  return &root_double[13];}
00109         else if (name=="opy") {if(!flag_opy)  return &root_double[14];}
00110         else if (name=="opz") {if(!flag_opz)  return &root_double[15];}
00111         else if (name=="ot") {if(!flag_ot)  return &root_double[16];}
00112         else if (name=="ppid") {if(!flag_ppid)  return &root_int[1];}
00113         else if (name=="ptid") {if(!flag_ptid)  return &root_int[2];}
00114         else if (name=="process") {if(!flag_process)  return root_str[0];}
00115         else if (name=="volume") {if(!flag_volume)  return root_str[1];}
00116 //      else if (name=="R0") {if(flag_R0)  return &root_double[7];}
00117 //      else if (name=="R1") {if(flag_R1)  return &root_double[8];}
00118         else if (name=="R0") {if(!flag_R0)  return &root_int[3];}
00119         else if (name=="R1") {if(!flag_R1)  return &root_int[4];}
00120         return NULL;
00121 }
00122 
00123 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::GeneratePrimaries(G4Event* anEvent)
00124 {
00125         //this function is called at the begining of event
00126         // 
00127         if (UseRoot){
00128                 root_get_para();
00129         }
00130         if (RandMode=="root"){
00131                 long seeds[3];
00132 //              seeds[0] = root_double[7];
00133 //              seeds[1] = root_double[8];
00134                 seeds[0] = root_int[3];
00135                 seeds[1] = root_int[4];
00136                 seeds[2] = 0;
00137 //              std::cout<<"setTheSeeds("<<(int)seeds[0]<<","<<(int)seeds[1]<<")"<<std::endl;
00138                 CLHEP::HepRandom::setTheSeeds(seeds);
00139         }
00140 
00141         // Show Status:
00142 //      std::cout<<"==>Event "<<root_index<<std::endl;
00143 //    CLHEP::HepRandom::showEngineStatus();
00144 
00145         EventHeaderSvc::GetEventHeaderSvc()->SetSeedsValue();
00146         EventHeaderSvc::GetEventHeaderSvc()->SetInitialMomentum(root_double[17],root_double[18],root_double[19]);
00147 
00148         if (fType=="ion"){
00149                 if (!fParticle){
00150                         G4ParticleTable* particleTable = G4ParticleTable::GetParticleTable();
00151                         fParticle = particleTable->GetIon(Z,A,E*keV);
00152                         if (!fParticle){
00153                                 std::cout<<"ERROR: In PrimaryGeneratorAction::PrimaryGeneratorAction() Cannot find particle "
00154                                                  <<"Z = "<<Z
00155                                                  <<", A = "<<A
00156                                                  <<", E = "<<E<<" keV"
00157                                                  <<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00158                                 G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::PrimaryGeneratorAction()","Run0031",
00159                                                 FatalException, "Cannot find particle.");
00160                         }
00161                 }
00162                 if (fType == "stable"){
00163                         fParticle->SetPDGStable(true);
00164                 }
00165                 particleGun->SetParticleDefinition(fParticle);
00166                 mass = particleGun->GetParticleDefinition()->GetPDGMass();
00167                 particleGun->SetParticleCharge(C*eplus);
00168         }
00169 
00170         if ( pidMode == "root"){
00171                 G4ParticleTable* particleTable = G4ParticleTable::GetParticleTable();
00172                 G4ParticleDefinition* particle = particleTable->FindParticle(root_int[0]);
00173                 if (!particle){
00174                         std::cout<<"ERROR: In PrimaryGeneratorAction::PrimaryGeneratorAction() Cannot find particle "<<root_int[0]<<"!!! Will use geantino"<<std::endl;
00175 //                      G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::PrimaryGeneratorAction()","Run0031",
00176 //                                      FatalException, "Cannot find particle.");
00177                         particle = particleTable->FindParticle("geantino");
00178                 }
00179                 if (fType == "stable"){
00180                         particle->SetPDGStable(true);
00181                 }
00182                 particleGun->SetParticleDefinition(particle);
00183                 mass = particleGun->GetParticleDefinition()->GetPDGMass();
00184         }
00185 
00186         if ( EnergyMode == "histo"){
00187                 G4double mom = EM_hist->GetRandom() * MeV;
00188                 G4double ekin = sqrt(mom*mom+mass*mass)-mass;
00189                 particleGun->SetParticleEnergy(ekin);
00190         }
00191         else if ( EnergyMode == "root" ){
00192                 //std::cout<<"PGA EM = root!"
00193                 //           <<", ("<<root_double[3]
00194                 //           <<","<<root_double[4]
00195                 //           <<","<<root_double[5]
00196                 //           <<") MeV"
00197                 //           <<std::endl;
00198                 G4double ekin = sqrt(root_double[3]*root_double[3]*MeV*MeV+root_double[4]*root_double[4]*MeV*MeV+root_double[5]*root_double[5]*MeV*MeV+mass*mass)-mass;
00199                 particleGun->SetParticleMomentumDirection(G4ThreeVector(root_double[3] * MeV, root_double[4] * MeV, root_double[5] * MeV).unit());
00200                 particleGun->SetParticleEnergy(ekin);
00201         }
00202         else if ( EnergyMode == "gRand" || EnergyMode == "uRand" ){
00203                 SetRandomEnergy();
00204         }
00205         else if ( EnergyMode != "none" ){
00206                 std::cout<<"ERROR: unknown EnergyMode: "<<EnergyMode<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00207                 G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::GeneratePrimaries()",
00208                                 "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00209                                 "unknown EnergyMode");
00210         }
00211 
00212         if ( DirectionMode == "uniform" ){
00213                 SetUniformDirection();
00214         }
00215         else if ( DirectionMode == "histo" ){
00216                 G4double theta = DM_hist->GetRandom() * rad;
00217                 G4double phi = G4UniformRand() * 360. *deg;
00218                 G4ThreeVector dir_3Vec(1, 1, 1);
00219                 dir_3Vec.setTheta(theta);
00220                 dir_3Vec.setPhi(phi);
00221                 particleGun->SetParticleMomentumDirection(dir_3Vec);
00222         }
00223         else if ( DirectionMode == "turtle" || PositionMode == "turtle") {
00224 
00225           // Plan
00226           // -- Get an X-Y position at muPC
00227           // -- Get an X-Y position at final focus 
00228           // -- Get the direction vector between the two
00229           // -- Track the direction forward to a start point
00230 
00231           if (!fXPositionFinalFocusFit && !fYPositionFinalFocusFit && !fMuPCBeamDistHist) {
00232             TDirectory* prev_dir = gDirectory;
00233             // Get the relevant functions/histograms
00234             std::string dir_name = getenv("CONFIGUREDATAROOT");
00235             dir_name += "TURTLE_fits.root";
00236             TFile* turtle_file = new TFile(dir_name.c_str(), "READ");
00237             
00238             // Get the functions that describe the x and y positions of the beam at the final focus
00239             fXPositionFinalFocusFit = (TF1*) turtle_file->Get("final_focus_horizontal");
00240             fYPositionFinalFocusFit = (TF1*) turtle_file->Get("final_focus_vertical");
00241 
00242             // Get the histogram of the beam distribution at the muPC
00243             fMuPCBeamDistHist = (TH2F*) turtle_file->Get("hmuPC_XYWires")->Clone(); // need to clone because the file will be closing soon
00244             fMuPCBeamDistHist->SetDirectory(0); // need to set directory to 0 so that we can use this histogram after the file is closed
00245             turtle_file->Close();
00246             gDirectory = prev_dir; // need to go back to where we were so that we can get the tree written to the output file
00247           }
00248 
00249           double x_muPC = 0;
00250           double y_muPC = 0;
00251           fMuPCBeamDistHist->GetRandom2(x_muPC, y_muPC);
00252           //      fMuPCBeamDistRandom->Fill(x_muPC, y_muPC);
00253           double z_muPC = 52.5; // approx 10cm downstream of the end of the beampipe (from previous g4sim geometry)
00254           
00255           double x_ff = fXPositionFinalFocusFit->GetRandom()*10; // convert from cm to mm
00256           double y_ff = fYPositionFinalFocusFit->GetRandom()*10; // convert from cm to mm
00257           //      fFFBeamDistRandom->Fill(x_ff, y_ff);
00258           double z_ff = 120; // 12cm downstream of the beam pipe (according to MuSun report)
00259           
00260           // Translate to having the target at the origin
00261           double z_pos_beam_pipe = -285.58 - 60; // relative to target
00262           double translation = z_pos_beam_pipe; // from g4sim geometry
00263           //      std::cout << "translation = " << translation << std::endl;
00264           z_muPC += translation; // from the g4sim geometry
00265           z_ff += translation; 
00266           
00267           G4ThreeVector muPCPos(x_muPC*mm, y_muPC*mm, z_muPC*mm);
00268           G4ThreeVector ffPos(x_ff*mm, y_ff*mm, z_ff*mm);
00269           //      std::cout << "muPC: (" << muPCPos.x()/mm << ", " << muPCPos.y()/mm << ", " << muPCPos.z()/mm << ") mm" << std::endl;  
00270           //      std::cout << "FF: (" << ffPos.x()/mm << ", " << ffPos.y()/mm << ", " << ffPos.z()/mm << ") mm" << std::endl;
00271           
00272           G4ThreeVector direction = (ffPos - muPCPos).unit();
00273           //      std::cout << "dir: (" << direction.x()/mm << ", " << direction.y()/mm << ", " << direction.z()/mm << ") mm" << std::endl;     
00274           
00275           // Track back to exit of beam pipe (z = -304*mm)
00276           double n_steps = (z_pos_beam_pipe - muPCPos.z()/mm) / (direction.z()/mm);
00277           //      std::cout << "n_steps to start of beam pipe: " << n_steps << std::endl;
00278           G4ThreeVector start_pos = muPCPos + n_steps*direction;
00279           //      std::cout << "start: (" << start_pos.x()/mm << ", " << start_pos.y()/mm << ", " << start_pos.z()/mm << ") mm" << std::endl;
00280 
00281           particleGun->SetParticlePosition(start_pos);
00282           particleGun->SetParticleMomentumDirection(direction);
00283         }
00284 
00285         else if ( DirectionMode != "none" ){
00286                 std::cout<<"ERROR: unknown DirectionMode: "<<DirectionMode<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00287                 G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::GeneratePrimaries()",
00288                                 "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00289                                 "unknown DirectionMode");
00290         }
00291 
00292 
00293         if ( PhiMode== "gRand" || PhiMode=="uRand" || ThetaMode== "gRand" || ThetaMode=="uRand" ){
00294                 SetRandomDirection();
00295         }
00296 
00297         if ( PositionMode == "uniform" ){
00298                 SetUniformPosition();
00299         }
00300         else if ( PositionMode == "root" ){
00301                 //std::cout<<"PGA PM = root!"
00302                 //           <<", ("<<root_double[0]
00303                 //           <<","<<root_double[1]
00304                 //           <<","<<root_double[2]
00305                 //           <<") mm"
00306                 //           <<std::endl;
00307                 particleGun->SetParticlePosition(G4ThreeVector(root_double[0] * mm, root_double[1] * mm, (root_double[2])*mm));
00308         }
00309         else if ( PositionMode == "gRand" || PositionMode == "sRand" || PositionMode == "bRand" ){
00310                 SetRandomPosition();
00311         }
00312         else if ( PositionMode == "target") {
00313           SetRandomPosition();  
00314         }
00315         else if ( PositionMode == "source") {
00316           SetRandomPosition();  
00317         }
00318         else if ( PositionMode == "turtle") {
00319           // Already handled in the DirectionMode if block
00320         }
00321         else if ( PositionMode != "none" ){
00322                 std::cout<<"ERROR: unknown PositionMode: "<<PositionMode<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00323                 G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::GeneratePrimaries()",
00324                                 "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00325                                 "unknown PositionMode");
00326         }
00327 
00328         if ( TimeMode == "root" ){
00329                 //std::cout<<"PGA TM = root!"
00330                 //           <<", ("<<root_double[6]
00331                 //           <<") ns"
00332                 //           <<std::endl;
00333                 particleGun->SetParticleTime(root_double[6]*ns);
00334         }
00335         else if ( TimeMode != "none" ){
00336                 std::cout<<"ERROR: unknown TimeMode: "<<TimeMode<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00337                 G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::GeneratePrimaries()",
00338                                 "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00339                                 "unknown TimeMode");
00340         }
00341 
00342         particleGun->GeneratePrimaryVertex(anEvent);
00343 
00344 //      std::cout.precision(17);
00345 //      std::cout<<"\tDirection: "<<particleGun->GetParticleMomentumDirection()<<std::endl;
00346 //      std::cout<<"\tEnergy: "<<particleGun->GetParticleEnergy()/MeV<<" MeV"<<std::endl;
00347 //      std::cout.precision(3);
00348 //    CLHEP::HepRandom::showEngineStatus();
00349         if (!UseRoot) root_index++;
00350 }
00351 
00352 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetUniformDirection(){
00353         G4double dir_x = 0., dir_y = 0., dir_z = 0.;
00354         G4bool dir_OK = false;
00355         while( !dir_OK ){
00356                 dir_x=G4UniformRand()-0.5;
00357                 dir_y=G4UniformRand()-0.5;
00358                 dir_z=G4UniformRand()-0.5;
00359                 if ( dir_x*dir_x + dir_y*dir_y + dir_z*dir_z <= 0.025 && dir_x*dir_x + dir_y*dir_y + dir_z*dir_z != 0) dir_OK = true;
00360         }
00361         G4ThreeVector dir_3Vec(dir_x, dir_y, dir_z);
00362         particleGun->SetParticleMomentumDirection(dir_3Vec);
00363 }
00364 
00365 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetRandomEnergy(){
00366         if (EnergyType == 1){
00367                 G4double dE=0;
00368                 if(EnergyMode=="gRand"){
00369                         dE=G4RandGauss::shoot(0,EkinSpread);
00370                 }
00371                 else if(EnergyMode=="uRand"){
00372                         dE=(G4UniformRand()-0.5)*EkinSpread;
00373                 }
00374                 particleGun->SetParticleEnergy(Ekin+dE);
00375         }
00376         else if (EnergyType == 0 ){
00377                 G4double dMom=0;
00378                 if(EnergyMode=="gRand"){
00379                         dMom=G4RandGauss::shoot(0,MomSpread);
00380                 }
00381                 else if(EnergyMode=="uRand"){
00382                         dMom=(G4UniformRand()-0.5)*MomSpread;
00383                 }
00384                 G4double ekin = sqrt((Pa+dMom)*(Pa+dMom)+mass*mass)-mass;
00385                 particleGun->SetParticleEnergy(ekin);
00386         }
00387 }
00388 
00389 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetRandomDirection(){
00390         G4double dPhi=0;
00391         G4double dTheta=0;
00392         if(PhiMode=="gRand"){
00393                 if (PhiSpread) dPhi=G4RandGauss::shoot(Phi,PhiSpread);
00394         }
00395         else if (PhiMode=="uRand"){
00396                 if (PhiSpread) {dPhi=(G4UniformRand()-0.5)*PhiSpread;} 
00397         }
00398         if(ThetaMode=="gRand"){
00399                 if (ThetaSpread) dTheta=G4RandGauss::shoot(Theta,ThetaSpread);
00400         }
00401         else if (ThetaMode=="uRand"){
00402                 if (ThetaSpread) {dTheta=(G4UniformRand()-0.5)*ThetaSpread;} 
00403         }
00404         G4ThreeVector dir(1,1,1);
00405         dir.setTheta(Theta+dTheta);
00406         dir.setPhi(Phi+dPhi);
00407         G4RotationMatrix rot(Ephi,Etheta,Epsi);
00408         dir = rot*dir;
00409         particleGun->SetParticleMomentumDirection(dir.unit());
00410 }
00411 
00412 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetRandomPosition(){
00413         G4double dx=0;
00414         G4double dy=0;
00415         G4double dz=0;
00416         G4double dx2=0;
00417         G4double dy2=0;
00418         G4double dz2=0;
00419         bool gotit=false;
00420         if(PositionMode=="gRand"){
00421                 do {
00422                         dx=G4RandGauss::shoot(0,xSpread);
00423                         dy=G4RandGauss::shoot(0,ySpread);
00424                         dz=G4RandGauss::shoot(0,zSpread);
00425                         if (dx2+dy2+dz2<=PosLimit2) gotit = true;
00426                 } while (!gotit);
00427         }
00428         else if (PositionMode=="sRand"){
00429                 do {
00430                         if (xSpread) {dx=2.*(G4UniformRand()-0.5);dx2 = dx*dx;dx*=xSpread;} 
00431                         if (ySpread) {dy=2.*(G4UniformRand()-0.5);dy2 = dy*dy;dy*=ySpread;} 
00432                         if (zSpread) {dz=2.*(G4UniformRand()-0.5);dz2 = dz*dz;dz*=zSpread;} 
00433                         if (dx2+dy2+dz2<=1.) gotit = true;
00434                 } while (!gotit);
00435         }
00436         else if (PositionMode=="bRand"){
00437                 if (xSpread) dx=2.*(G4UniformRand()-0.5)*xSpread;
00438                 if (ySpread) dy=2.*(G4UniformRand()-0.5)*ySpread;
00439                 if (zSpread) dz=2.*(G4UniformRand()-0.5)*zSpread;
00440         }
00441         else if (PositionMode=="source" || PositionMode=="target"){
00442           // Make sure that the random position chosen is within the Target volume
00443           G4Navigator* theNavigator = G4TransportationManager::GetTransportationManager()->GetNavigatorForTracking();
00444 
00445           // Get a random position based on the spread (copied code from gRand)
00446           do {
00447                         //dx=G4RandGauss::shoot(0,xSpread);
00448                         //dy=G4RandGauss::shoot(0,ySpread);
00449                         //dz=G4RandGauss::shoot(0,zSpread);
00450             dx=G4RandFlat::shoot(-xSpread,xSpread);
00451             dy=G4RandFlat::shoot(-ySpread,ySpread);
00452             dz=G4RandFlat::shoot(-xSpread,zSpread);
00453 
00454             G4ThreeVector position(x+dx, y+dy, z+dz);
00455             CLHEP::HepEulerAngles rotation(45*deg, 90*deg, 0*deg);
00456             G4ThreeVector new_position = position.rotate(rotation);
00457             G4VPhysicalVolume* phys_volume = theNavigator->LocateGlobalPointAndSetup(new_position);
00458 
00459             if (!phys_volume) {
00460               continue; // if theNavigator didn't return a physical volume
00461             }
00462 
00463             if ( (PositionMode=="source" && phys_volume->GetName() == "Source") ||
00464                  (PositionMode=="target" && phys_volume->GetName() == "Target") ) {
00465               gotit = true;
00466             }
00467           } while (!gotit);
00468         }
00469 
00470   G4ThreeVector position(x+dx, y+dy, z+dz);
00471   if (PositionMode == "source" || PositionMode == "target") {
00472     CLHEP::HepEulerAngles rotation(45*deg, 90*deg, 0*deg);
00473     position = position.rotate(rotation);
00474   }
00475   particleGun->SetParticlePosition(position);
00476 }
00477 
00478 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetUniformPosition(){
00479         MyVGeometryParameter* pMyVGeometryParameter = MyDetectorManager::GetMyDetectorManager()->GetSvc(UP_SubDet)->get_GeometryParameter();
00480         if (!pMyVGeometryParameter){
00481                 std::cout<<"ERROR: in PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetUniformPosition cannot find : "<<UP_SubDet<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00482                 G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetUniformPosition()",
00483                                 "InvalidInput", FatalException,
00484                                 "cannot ");
00485         }
00486         if ( UP_Type == "Simple" ){
00487                 SimpleGeometryParameter* pSimpleGeometryParameter = dynamic_cast<SimpleGeometryParameter*> (pMyVGeometryParameter);
00488                 if (!pSimpleGeometryParameter){
00489                         std::cout<<"ERROR: in PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetUniformPosition cannot convert : "<<UP_SubDet<<" from MyVGeometryParameter to SimpleGeometryParameter!!!"<<std::endl;
00490                         G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetUniformPosition()",
00491                                         "InvalidInput", FatalException,
00492                                         "cannot convert from MyVGeometryParameter to SimpleGeometryParameter");
00493                 }
00494                 int index = pSimpleGeometryParameter->get_VolIndex(UP_Volume);
00495                 if ( index == -1 ){
00496                         std::cout<<"ERROR: in PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetUniformPosition cannot find : "<<UP_Volume<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00497                         G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetUniformPosition()",
00498                                         "InvalidInput", FatalException,
00499                                         "cannot convert volume");
00500                 }
00501                 G4String sol_type = pSimpleGeometryParameter->get_SolidType(index);
00502                 G4ThreeVector pos(1,0,0);
00503                 G4int n = pSimpleGeometryParameter->get_RepNo(index);
00504                 G4int ivol = G4UniformRand()*n;
00505                 if ( sol_type == "Tubs" ){
00506                         G4double RMax,RMin,length,StartPhi,SpanPhi;
00507                         G4int iTubs = pSimpleGeometryParameter->get_SolidIndex(index);
00508                         RMax = pSimpleGeometryParameter->get_Tubs_RMax(iTubs,ivol);
00509                         RMin = pSimpleGeometryParameter->get_Tubs_RMin(iTubs,ivol);
00510                         length = pSimpleGeometryParameter->get_Tubs_Length(iTubs,ivol);
00511                         StartPhi = pSimpleGeometryParameter->get_Tubs_StartAng(iTubs,ivol);
00512                         SpanPhi = pSimpleGeometryParameter->get_Tubs_SpanAng(iTubs,ivol);
00513 
00514                         G4double iz, iphi, ir;
00515                         iz = G4UniformRand()*length -length/2;
00516                         iphi = G4UniformRand()*SpanPhi + StartPhi;
00517                         ir = G4UniformRand()*(RMax*RMax-RMin*RMin)+RMin*RMin;
00518                         ir = sqrt(ir);
00519                         pos.setPhi(iphi);
00520                         pos.setRho(ir);
00521                         pos.setZ(iz);
00522                 }
00523                 else{
00524                         std::cout<<"ERROR: in PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetUniformPosition unsupported solid type: "<<sol_type<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00525                         G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetUniformPosition()",
00526                                         "InvalidInput", FatalException,
00527                                         "unsupported solid type");
00528                 }
00529                 G4double xp,yp,zp;
00530                 xp = pSimpleGeometryParameter->get_PosX(index,ivol);
00531                 yp = pSimpleGeometryParameter->get_PosY(index,ivol);
00532                 zp = pSimpleGeometryParameter->get_PosZ(index,ivol);
00533                 pos += G4ThreeVector(xp,yp,zp);
00534                 G4String mot_volume = pSimpleGeometryParameter->get_MotherName(index);
00535                 SimpleGeometryParameter * pmotSimpleGeometryParameter = 0;
00536                 int temp_index = index;
00537                 int mot_index = -1;
00538                 while (mot_volume!="None"){
00539                         pmotSimpleGeometryParameter = MyDetectorManager::GetMyDetectorManager()->GetParaFromVolume(mot_volume);
00540                         int mot_index = pmotSimpleGeometryParameter->get_VolIndex(mot_volume);
00541                         G4double mot_xp = pmotSimpleGeometryParameter->get_PosX(mot_index);
00542                         G4double mot_yp = pmotSimpleGeometryParameter->get_PosY(mot_index);
00543                         G4double mot_zp = pmotSimpleGeometryParameter->get_PosZ(mot_index);
00544                         pos += G4ThreeVector(mot_xp,mot_yp,mot_zp);
00545                         temp_index = mot_index;
00546                         mot_volume = pmotSimpleGeometryParameter->get_MotherName(temp_index);
00547                 }
00548                 particleGun->SetParticlePosition(pos);
00549         }
00550         else{
00551                 std::cout<<"ERROR: in PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetUniformPosition unsopported parameter class type: "<<UP_Type<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00552                 G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::SetUniformPosition()",
00553                                 "InvalidInput", FatalException,
00554                                 "unsopported parameter class type");
00555         }
00556 }
00557 
00558 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::BuildHistoFromFile(){
00559         G4String dir_name = getenv("CONFIGUREDATAROOT");
00560         if (dir_name[dir_name.size()-1] != '/') dir_name.append("/");
00561 
00562         // EnergyMode
00563         if (EnergyMode=="histo"){
00564                 G4String full_infile_name = dir_name +  EM_hist_filename;
00565 //              if (fp) delete fp;
00566                 fp = new TFile(full_infile_name.c_str());
00567                 if (fp==NULL) {
00568                         std::cout<<"ERROR: Can not find file: "<<full_infile_name<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00569                         G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::BuildHistoFromFile()",
00570                                         "InvalidInput", FatalException,
00571                                         "Can not find file");
00572                 }
00573                 TH1F* h = (TH1F*)fp->Get(EM_hist_histname.c_str());
00574                 if(h==NULL){
00575                         std::cout<<"ERROR: Can not find file: "<<full_infile_name<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00576                         G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::BuildHistoFromFile()",
00577                                         "InvalidInput", FatalException,
00578                                         "Can not find file");
00579                 }
00580                 EM_hist = h;
00581         }
00582 
00583         // DirectionMode
00584         if (DirectionMode=="histo"){
00585                 G4String full_infile_name = dir_name +  DM_hist_filename;
00586                 if (fp) delete fp;
00587                 fp = new TFile(full_infile_name.c_str());
00588                 if (fp==NULL) {
00589                         std::cout<<"ERROR: Can not find file: "<<full_infile_name<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00590                         G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::BuildHistoFromFile()",
00591                                         "InvalidInput", FatalException,
00592                                         "Can not find file");
00593                 }
00594                 TH1F* h = (TH1F*)fp->Get(DM_hist_histname.c_str());
00595                 if(h==NULL){
00596                         std::cout<<"ERROR: Can not find file: "<<full_infile_name<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00597                         G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::BuildHistoFromFile()",
00598                                         "InvalidInput", FatalException,
00599                                         "Can not find file");
00600                 }
00601                 DM_hist = h;
00602         }
00603         
00604 }
00605 
00606 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::root_get_para(){
00607         int iEvent = (int) fmod(root_index,root_num);
00608         m_TChain->GetEntry(iEvent);
00609         root_index++;
00610 }
00611 
00612 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::root_build(){
00613         G4String dir_name = getenv("CONFIGUREDATAROOT");
00614         if (dir_name[dir_name.size()-1] != '/') dir_name.append("/");
00615         std::string m_TFile_name = dir_name + root_filename;
00616         if (root_filename[0] == '/')
00617                 m_TFile_name = root_filename;
00618         //if (m_TChain) delete m_TChain;
00619         m_TChain = new TChain("t");
00620         m_TChain->Add(m_TFile_name.c_str());
00621         root_num = m_TChain->GetEntries();
00622         root_set_extra();
00623         if ( EnergyMode == "root" ){
00624                 UseRoot = true;
00625                 root_set_Energy();
00626         }
00627         if ( PositionMode == "root" ){
00628                 UseRoot = true;
00629                 root_set_Position();
00630         }
00631         if ( TimeMode == "root" ){
00632                 UseRoot = true;
00633                 root_set_Time();
00634         }
00635         if ( pidMode == "root" ){
00636                 UseRoot = true;
00637                 root_set_pid();
00638         }
00639         if ( RandMode == "root" ){
00640                 root_set_Rand();
00641         }
00642 }
00643 
00644 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::root_set_Position(){
00645         m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("x", &root_double[0]);
00646         m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("y", &root_double[1]);
00647         m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("z", &root_double[2]);
00648 }
00649 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::root_set_Energy(){
00650         m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("px", &root_double[3]);
00651         m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("py", &root_double[4]);
00652         m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("pz", &root_double[5]);
00653 }
00654 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::root_set_Time(){
00655         m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("t", &root_double[6]);
00656 }
00657 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::root_set_pid(){
00658         m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("pid", &root_int[0]);
00659 }
00660 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::root_set_Rand(){
00661 //      flag_R0 = m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("R0", &root_double[7]);
00662 //      flag_R1 = m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("R1", &root_double[8]);
00663         flag_R0 = m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("R0", &root_int[3]);
00664         flag_R1 = m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("R1", &root_int[4]);
00665 }
00666 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::root_set_extra(){
00667         flag_weight=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("weight", &root_double[9]);
00668         flag_ox=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("ox", &root_double[10]);
00669         flag_oy=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("oy", &root_double[11]);
00670         flag_oz=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("oz", &root_double[12]);
00671         flag_opx=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("opx", &root_double[13]);
00672         flag_opy=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("opy", &root_double[14]);
00673         flag_opz=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("opz", &root_double[15]);
00674         flag_ot=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("ot", &root_double[16]);
00675         flag_ipx=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("ipx", &root_double[17]);
00676         flag_ipy=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("ipy", &root_double[18]);
00677         flag_ipz=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("ipz", &root_double[19]);
00678         flag_process=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("process",&root_str[0]);
00679         flag_volume=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("volume",&root_str[1]);
00680         flag_ppid=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("ppid",&root_int[1]);
00681         flag_ptid=m_TChain->SetBranchAddress("ptid",&root_int[2]);
00682 }
00683 
00684 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::ResetGen(G4String file_name){
00685         ReadCard(file_name);
00686         Initialize();
00687 }
00688 
00689 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::ReadCard(G4String file_name){
00690         std::cout<<" -- PrimaryGeneratorAction: Reading from \""<<file_name<<"\""<<std::endl;
00691         Reset();
00692         if(file_name[0] != '/'){ // Relative Dir
00693                 G4String dir_name = getenv("CONFIGUREROOT");
00694                 if (dir_name[dir_name.size()-1] != '/') dir_name.append("/");
00695                 file_name = dir_name + file_name;
00696         }
00697         std::ifstream fin_card(file_name);
00698         if ( !fin_card ){
00699                 std::cout<<"generator file \""<<file_name<<"\" is not available!!!"<<std::endl;
00700                 G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::PrimaryGeneratorAction()","Run0031",
00701                                 FatalException, "generator file is not available.");
00702         }
00703         std::stringstream buf_card;
00704         std::string s_card;
00705         while(getline(fin_card,s_card)){
00706                 buf_card.str("");
00707                 buf_card.clear();
00708                 buf_card<<s_card;
00709                 const char* c = s_card.c_str();
00710                 int length = strlen(c);
00711                 int offset = 0;
00712                 for ( ; offset < length; offset++ ){
00713                         if ( c[offset] != ' ' ) break;
00714                 }
00715                 if ( c[offset] == '#' ) continue;
00716                 else if ( c[offset] == '/' && c[offset+1] == '/' ) continue;
00717                 else if ( length - offset == 0 ) continue;
00718                 std::string keyword;
00719                 std::string temp;
00720                 buf_card>>keyword;
00721                 if ( keyword == "Type:" ){
00722                         buf_card>>fType;
00723                 }
00724                 else if ( keyword == "Particle:" ){
00725                         buf_card>>ParticleName;
00726                 }
00727                 else if ( keyword == "Z:" ){
00728                         buf_card>>Z;
00729                 }
00730                 else if ( keyword == "A:" ){
00731                         buf_card>>A;
00732                 }
00733                 else if ( keyword == "C:" ){
00734                         buf_card>>C;
00735                 }
00736                 else if ( keyword == "E:" ){
00737                         buf_card>>E;
00738                 }
00739                 else if ( keyword == "Direction:" ){
00740                         buf_card>>temp;
00741                         Theta = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*deg;
00742                         buf_card>>temp;
00743                         Phi = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*deg;
00744                 }
00745                 else if ( keyword == "PhiSpread:" ){
00746                         buf_card>>temp;
00747                         PhiSpread = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*deg;
00748                 }
00749                 else if ( keyword == "Ephi:" ){
00750                         buf_card>>temp;
00751                         Ephi = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*deg;
00752                 }
00753                 else if ( keyword == "Etheta:" ){
00754                         buf_card>>temp;
00755                         Etheta = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*deg;
00756                 }
00757                 else if ( keyword == "Epsi:" ){
00758                         buf_card>>temp;
00759                         Epsi = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*deg;
00760                 }
00761                 else if ( keyword == "ThetaSpread:" ){
00762                         buf_card>>temp;
00763                         ThetaSpread = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*deg;
00764                 }
00765                 else if ( keyword == "MomAmp:" ){
00766                         buf_card>>temp;
00767                         Pa = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*MeV;
00768                         EnergyType = 0;
00769                 }
00770                 else if ( keyword == "MomSpread:" ){
00771                         buf_card>>temp;
00772                         MomSpread = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*MeV;
00773                 }
00774                 else if ( keyword == "Ekin:" ){
00775                         buf_card>>temp;
00776                         Ekin = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*MeV;
00777                         EnergyType = 1;
00778                 }
00779                 else if ( keyword == "EkinSpread:" ){
00780                         buf_card>>temp;
00781                         EkinSpread = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*MeV;
00782                 }
00783                 else if ( keyword == "Position:" ){
00784                         buf_card>>temp;
00785                         x = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*mm;
00786                         buf_card>>temp;
00787                         y = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*mm;
00788                         buf_card>>temp;
00789                         z = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*mm;
00790                 }
00791                 else if ( keyword == "PosSpread:" ){
00792                         buf_card>>temp;
00793                         xSpread = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*mm;
00794                         buf_card>>temp;
00795                         ySpread = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*mm;
00796                         buf_card>>temp;
00797                         zSpread = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*mm;
00798                 }
00799                 else if ( keyword == "PosLimit:" ){
00800                         buf_card>>temp;
00801                         PosLimit2 = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*mm;
00802                         PosLimit2 *= PosLimit2;
00803                 }
00804                 else if ( keyword == "Time:" ){
00805                         buf_card>>temp;
00806                         t = CalFormula(ReplaceMacro(temp))*ns;
00807                 }
00808                 else if ( keyword == "RandMode:" ){
00809                         buf_card>>RandMode;
00810                 }
00811                 else if ( keyword == "EnergyMode:" ){
00812                         buf_card>>EnergyMode;
00813                 }
00814                 else if ( keyword == "PositionMode:" ){
00815                         buf_card>>PositionMode;
00816                 }
00817                 else if ( keyword == "TimeMode:" ){
00818                         buf_card>>TimeMode;
00819                 }
00820                 else if ( keyword == "pidMode:" ){
00821                         buf_card>>pidMode;
00822                 }
00823                 else if ( keyword == "DirectionMode:" ){
00824                         buf_card>>DirectionMode;
00825                 }
00826                 else if ( keyword == "ThetaMode:" ){
00827                         buf_card>>ThetaMode;
00828                 }
00829                 else if ( keyword == "PhiMode:" ){
00830                         buf_card>>PhiMode;
00831                 }
00832                 else if ( keyword == "EMHFN:" ){
00833                         buf_card>>EM_hist_filename;
00834                 }
00835                 else if ( keyword == "EMHHN:" ){
00836                         buf_card>>EM_hist_histname;
00837                 }
00838                 else if ( keyword == "DMHFN:" ){
00839                         buf_card>>DM_hist_filename;
00840                 }
00841                 else if ( keyword == "DMHHN:" ){
00842                         buf_card>>DM_hist_histname;
00843                 }
00844                 else if ( keyword == "RFN:" ){
00845                         buf_card>>root_filename;
00846                 }
00847                 else if ( keyword == "RTN:" ){
00848                         buf_card>>root_treename;
00849                 }
00850                 else if ( keyword == "UIV:" ){
00851                         buf_card>>UP_Type>>UP_SubDet>>UP_Volume;
00852                 }
00853                 else if ( keyword == "DEFINE:" ){
00854                         G4String MacroName;
00855                         G4String MacroValue;
00856                         buf_card>>MacroName>>MacroValue;
00857 //                      std::cout<<"found DEFINE:"<<std::endl; // to be deleted
00858                         MacroValue = ReplaceMacro(MacroValue);
00859                         bool foundName = false;
00860                         for (int i = 0; i < knownValueNames.size(); i++){
00861                                 if (knownValueNames[i]==MacroName){ // If this name occurred once, replace the value
00862                                         foundName = true;
00863                                         knownValues[i]=MacroValue;
00864                                         break;
00865                                 }
00866                         }
00867                         if (!foundName){
00868                                 knownValueNames.push_back(MacroName);
00869                                 knownValues.push_back(MacroValue);
00870                         }
00871                 }
00872                 else{
00873                         std::cout<<"In PrimaryGeneratorAction::ReadCard, unknown name: "<<keyword<<" in file "<<file_name<<std::endl;
00874                         std::cout<<"Will ignore this line!"<<std::endl;
00875                 }
00876         }
00877         fin_card.close();
00878         buf_card.str("");
00879         buf_card.clear();
00880         Dump();
00881 }
00882 
00883 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::Reset(){
00884         fType = "simple";
00885         RandMode = "none";
00886         EnergyMode = "none";
00887         PositionMode = "none";
00888         TimeMode = "none";
00889         pidMode = "none";
00890         DirectionMode = "none";
00891         PhiMode = "none";
00892         ThetaMode = "none";
00893         ParticleName = "chargedgeantino";
00894         EM_hist_filename = "";
00895         EM_hist_histname = "";
00896         DM_hist_filename = "";
00897         DM_hist_histname = "";
00898         root_filename = "";
00899         root_treename = "";
00900         UP_SubDet = "";
00901         UP_Volume = "";
00902         UP_Type = "";
00903         EnergyType = 1;
00904         Z = 1;
00905         A = 1;
00906         C = 0;
00907         E = 0;
00908         Pa = 0;
00909         Ekin = 0;
00910         mass = 0;
00911         Px = 0;
00912         Py = 0;
00913         Pz = 0;
00914         Theta = 0;
00915         Phi = 0;
00916         x = 0;
00917         y = 0;
00918         z = 0;
00919         t = 0;
00920         xSpread = 0;
00921         ySpread = 0;
00922         zSpread = 0;
00923         PosLimit2 = 0;
00924         MomSpread = 0;
00925         EkinSpread = 0;
00926         ThetaSpread = 0;
00927         PhiSpread = 0;
00928         Ephi = 0;
00929         Etheta = 0;
00930         Epsi = 0;
00931         EM_hist = 0;
00932         DM_hist = 0;
00933         root_num = 0;
00934         root_index = 0;
00935         UseRoot = false;
00936         flag_weight = false;
00937         flag_ox = false;
00938         flag_oy = false;
00939         flag_oz = false;
00940         flag_opx = false;
00941         flag_opy = false;
00942         flag_opz = false;
00943         flag_ipx = false;
00944         flag_ipy = false;
00945         flag_ipz = false;
00946         flag_ot = false;
00947         flag_process = false;
00948         flag_volume = false;
00949         flag_R0 = false;
00950         flag_R1 = false;
00951         flag_ppid = false;
00952         flag_ptid = false;
00953 }
00954 
00955 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::Initialize(){
00956         if (fType == "simple" || fType == "stable" || fType == "ion" ){
00957                 G4int n_particle = 1;
00958                 if (particleGun) delete particleGun;
00959                 particleGun  = new G4ParticleGun(n_particle);
00960         }
00961         else {
00962                 G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::PrimaryGeneratorAction()","Run0031",
00963                                 FatalException, "unknown generator type.");
00964         }
00965 
00966         G4ParticleTable* particleTable = G4ParticleTable::GetParticleTable();
00967         G4ParticleDefinition* particle = particleTable->FindParticle(ParticleName);
00968         if (!particle){
00969                 std::cout<<"ERROR: In PrimaryGeneratorAction::PrimaryGeneratorAction() Cannot find particle "<<ParticleName<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00970                 G4Exception("PrimaryGeneratorAction::PrimaryGeneratorAction()","Run0031",
00971                                 FatalException, "Cannot find particle.");
00972         }
00973         if (fType == "stable"){
00974                 particle->SetPDGStable(true);
00975         }
00976         particleGun->SetParticleDefinition(particle);
00977         mass = particleGun->GetParticleDefinition()->GetPDGMass();
00978         G4ThreeVector dir(1,0,0);
00979         dir.setTheta(Theta);
00980         dir.setPhi(Phi);
00981         particleGun->SetParticleMomentumDirection(dir.unit());
00982         if (EnergyType==0){
00983                 Ekin = sqrt(Pa*Pa+mass*mass)-mass;
00984         }
00985         particleGun->SetParticleEnergy(Ekin);
00986         particleGun->SetParticlePosition(G4ThreeVector(x,y,z));
00987         particleGun->SetParticleTime(t);
00988 
00989         if (EnergyMode == "histo" || DirectionMode == "histo" ){
00990                 BuildHistoFromFile();
00991         }
00992         UseRoot = false;
00993         if ( EnergyMode == "root" || PositionMode == "root" || TimeMode == "root" || pidMode == "root" || RandMode == "root"){
00994                 UseRoot = true;
00995                 root_build();
00996         }
00997         root_double[9]=1; // weight
00998         root_double[10]=-1;
00999         root_double[11]=-1;
01000         root_double[12]=-1;
01001         root_double[13]=-1;
01002         root_double[14]=-1;
01003         root_double[15]=-1;
01004         root_double[16]=-1;
01005         root_str[0]=0;
01006         root_str[1]=0;
01007         root_int[1]=-1;
01008         root_int[2]=-1;
01009 }
01010 
01011 void PrimaryGeneratorAction::Dump(){
01012         std::cout<<"---------------PrimaryGeneratorAction---------------------"<<std::endl;
01013         std::cout<<"Type:                                         "<<fType<<std::endl;
01014         if (fType=="ion"){
01015         std::cout<<"Z:                                            "<<Z<<std::endl;
01016         std::cout<<"A:                                            "<<A<<std::endl;
01017         std::cout<<"C:                                            "<<C<<std::endl;
01018         std::cout<<"E:                                            "<<E<<std::endl;
01019         }
01020         else{
01021         std::cout<<"Particle:                                     "<<ParticleName<<std::endl;
01022         }
01023         std::cout<<"Default Momentum Direction: theta =           "<<Theta/deg<<"deg, phi = "<<Phi/deg<<"deg"<<std::endl;
01024         std::cout<<"Default Phi Spread:                           "<<PhiSpread/deg<<"deg"<<std::endl;
01025         std::cout<<"Default Ephi Spread:                          "<<Ephi/deg<<"deg"<<std::endl;
01026         std::cout<<"Default Etheta Spread:                        "<<Etheta/deg<<"deg"<<std::endl;
01027         std::cout<<"Default Epsi Spread:                          "<<Epsi/deg<<"deg"<<std::endl;
01028         std::cout<<"Default Theta Spread:                         "<<ThetaSpread/deg<<"deg"<<std::endl;
01029         if (EnergyType==0){
01030         std::cout<<"Default Momentum Amplitude:                   "<<Pa/MeV<<"MeV"<<std::endl;
01031         std::cout<<"Default Momentum Spread(MeV/c):               ("<<MomSpread/MeV<<std::endl;
01032         }
01033         else if (EnergyType==1){
01034         std::cout<<"Default Kinetic Energy:                       "<<Ekin/MeV<<"MeV"<<std::endl;
01035         std::cout<<"Default Energy Spread(MeV):                   ("<<EkinSpread/MeV<<std::endl;
01036         }
01037         std::cout<<"Default Position(mm):                         ("<<x/mm<<", "<<y/mm<<", "<<z/mm<<")"<<std::endl;
01038         std::cout<<"Default Position Spread(mm):                  ("<<xSpread/mm<<", "<<ySpread/mm<<", "<<zSpread/mm<<")"<<std::endl;
01039         std::cout<<"Default Position Limit(mm):                   ("<<sqrt(PosLimit2)/mm<<std::endl;
01040         std::cout<<"Default Time(ns):                             ("<<t/ns<<std::endl;
01041         std::cout<<"EnergyMode:                                   "<<EnergyMode<<std::endl;
01042         std::cout<<"PositionMode:                                 "<<PositionMode<<std::endl;
01043         std::cout<<"TimeMode:                                     "<<TimeMode<<std::endl;
01044         std::cout<<"pidMode:                                      "<<pidMode<<std::endl;
01045         std::cout<<"Uniform In sub-detector:                      "<<UP_SubDet<<std::endl;
01046         std::cout<<"  Volume:                                     "<<UP_Volume<<std::endl;
01047         std::cout<<"  Type:                                       "<<UP_Type<<std::endl;
01048         std::cout<<"DirectionMode:                                "<<DirectionMode<<std::endl;
01049         std::cout<<"PhiMode:                                      "<<PhiMode<<std::endl;
01050         std::cout<<"ThetaMode:                                    "<<ThetaMode<<std::endl;
01051         std::cout<<"File Name for EnergyMode = histo:             "<<EM_hist_filename<<std::endl;
